Prevent data race for `pathHandlers`

events.body: Code review ACK 4296dde28757d88a7076847484669fb202b47bc8. This should protect the vector. It also seems to make the http_request_cb callback single threaded, but that seems ok, since it is just adding work queue items not actually processing requests.
